subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP Maker Problem
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Very good, problem solved. :)

-- 

> I went under extras and change the sound devices from Modem #0 Line
> playback, and change it to Crystal Sounf Fusion (tm). It works!!!
   
>   Thanks Guys
   
>   Rees
   
>   Stefan Bion wrote:
>   Hi Rees,

> ok, this is the original file I made. I tested it - it works on my PC.

>> Windows 2000 professional

> Same as mine.

>> Sound card unkown

> Could be important...

> Did you check the EVPmaker settings on your PC as I described? It might
> be that another device, such as a webcam, has made itself the default
> sound device. Try to select a different sound device, if available.

> Stefan
